Self: 5 turns Clavatian Heart
Knock Back to target on hit

passives.name: Field Burst Extension
passives.desc:
When using Field Burst:
 • Becomes group attack
 • All targets: 5 turns SPD Down I

After using Field Burst:
 • BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (high turn rate; grants party BRV based on own ATK after use) for 5 turns
passives.short_desc: Field Burst Extension: Boost to Field Burst

passives.name: Debuff Boost
passives.desc: Moderately raises MAX BRV while an enemy is debuffed

passive.desc: Boost to EX ability Gae Bolg

passives.name: Gae Bolg Force Advance

passives.name: Bahamut Tail Extension Attack Up++
passives.desc:
While equipping EX+ weapon Rampage Jegon (FFCC)+ or passive ability Bahamut Tail Extension:
 • Moderately raises ATK

BRV Attack、 BRV Attack+ becomes BRV Attack++ (BRV attack hit count becomes 2; slightly increased cumulative BRV damage; grants party BRV based on own ATK; higher turn rate)

HP Attack+ becomes HP Attack++ (magic BRV attack + HP attack; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%)
passives.short_desc: Bahamut Tail Extension Attack Up++: Raises ATK; enables BRV Attack++、 HP Attack++

passives.name: Field Burst & Energy Gain Buff Starting
passives.desc: At start of quest:\n • Self: 6 turns MAX BRV Up II、 MAG ATK Up I
passives.short_desc: Field Burst & Energy Gain Buff Starting: MAX BRV Up II、 MAG ATK Up I at start of quest

passives.name: Gae Bolg BRV Hit Plus Force Advance Buff Longer
passives.desc:
When using Gae Bolg:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 8; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Largely raises limit of BRV that may be stolen in excess of MAX BRV
 • Extends own active buff duration 1 turn
passives.short_desc: Gae Bolg BRV Hit Plus Force Advance Buff Longer: Boost to Gae Bolg
